db:abstract.db:para: A C++ application that demonstrates how to render a scene in Qt 3D.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
QT += 3dcore 3drender 3dinput 3dextras
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ orbittransformcontroller.cpp
HEADERS += \ orbittransformcontroller.h
